meanings.definition: Resembling a stylus in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The styliform pen had a sleek design.
meanings.sent2: Her styliform earrings added elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The styliform ruler decided to measure up to the competition.
meanings.sent4: His styliform fingers danced across the piano keys.
meanings.sent5: The styliform silhouette of the building stood out against the skyline.

meanings.sent1: The styliform tree branches reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The styliform icicles hung from the roof.
meanings.sent3: The styliform pencil tried to stand out in the box.
meanings.sent4: Her styliform heels clicked on the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The styliform tower pierced the clouds above.
